column2: TAT Technologies Ltd. provides a variety of services and products to the commercial and military aerospace and ground defense industries. The company operates in four segments: original equipment manufacturing (OEM) of heat transfer products and aviation accessories components, which it operates through its Gedera facility; heat transfer services and products, which it operates through its Limco subsidiary; maintenance, repair and overhaul (MRO) services for aviation components, especially in the area of landing gear and auxiliary power unitsmaintenance, repair and overhaul (MRO) services for aviation components, which it operates through its Piedmont Aviation Component Services LLC (Piedmont) subsidiary, and overhaul and coating of jet engine components, which it operates through its subsidiary, Turbochrome Ltd.
